metadata.titleCn: 黑河生态水文遥感试验：水文气象观测网数据集（大满超级站气象要素梯度观测系统-2016）
metadata.description:
This data set contains the data of meteorological element gradient observation system of dashman superstation in the middle reaches of heihe hydrometeorological observation network from January 1, 2016 to December 31, 2016.The station is located in the farmland of daman irrigation district of zhangye city, gansu province.The longitude and latitude of the observation point are 100.3722e, 38.8555n and 1556m above sea level.The wind speed/direction, air temperature and relative humidity sensors are located at 3m, 5m, 10m, 15m, 20m, 30m and 40m respectively, with a total of 7 layers, facing due north.The barometer is installed at 2m;The tilting bucket rain gauge was installed at about 8m on the west side of the tower, with a height of 2.5m;The four-component radiometer is installed at 12m, facing due south;Two infrared thermometers are installed at 12m, facing due south and the probe facing vertically downward.Soil heat flow plate (self-calibration formal) (3 pieces) were buried in the ground 6cm in turn, 2m away from the tower body due south, two of which (Gs_2 and Gs_3) were buried between the trees, and one (Gs_1) was buried under the plants.The mean soil temperature sensor TCAV is buried 2cm and 4cm underground, facing due south and 2m away from the tower body.The soil temperature probe is buried at 0cm of the surface and 2cm, 4cm, 10cm, 20cm, 40cm, 80cm, 120cm and 160cm underground, 2m to the south of the meteorological tower.The soil water sensor is buried 2cm, 4cm, 10cm, 20cm, 40cm, 80cm, 120cm and 160cm underground, 2m to the south of the meteorological tower.The photosynthetic effective radiometer is installed at 12m with the probe facing vertically upward.Four other photosynthetically active radiometers were installed above and inside the canopy, 12m above the canopy (one probe vertically up and one probe vertically down), and 0.3m above the canopy (one probe vertically up and one probe vertically down), facing due south.
The observation items are: wind speed (WS_3m, WS_5m, WS_10m, WS_15m, WS_20m, WS_30m, WS_40m) (unit: m/s), wind direction (WD_3m, WD_5m, WD_10m, WD_15m, WD_20m, WD_30m, WD_40m) (unit:Air temperature and humidity (Ta_3m, Ta_5m, Ta_10m, Ta_15m, Ta_20m, Ta_30m, Ta_40m and RH_3m, RH_5m, RH_10m, RH_15m, RH_20m, RH_30m, RH_40m) (unit: Celsius, percentage), air pressure (Press) (unit: hpa), precipitation (Rain) (unit: mm), four-component radiation (DR, UR, DLR_Cor, ULR_Cor, Rn) (unit:Watts/m2), surface radiant temperature (IRT_1, IRT_2) (unit: Celsius), average soil temperature (TCAV) (unit: Celsius), soil heat flux (Gs_1, Gs_2, Gs_3) (unit: watts/m2), soil moisture (Ms_2cm, Ms_4cm, Ms_10cm, Ms_20cm, Ms_40cm, Ms_80cm, Ms_120cm, Ms_160cm) (unit:Soil temperature (Ts_0cm, Ts_2cm, Ts_4cm, Ts_10cm, Ts_20cm, Ts_40cm, Ts_80cm, Ts_120cm, Ts_160cm)Mmol/m s) and the upward and downward photosynthetic effective radiation (PAR_D_up, PAR_D_down) under the canopy (in mmol/m s).
Processing and quality control of observed data :(1) ensure 144 pieces of data every day (every 10min), and mark by -6999 in case of data missing;The sensor in the soil part was adjusted and the data could not be used;(2) excluding the time with duplicate records;(3) data that obviously exceeds the physical significance or the range of the instrument is deleted;(4) the part marked with red letter in the data is the data in question;(5) date and time have the same format, and date and time are in the same column.For example, the time is: 2016-6-10-10:30;(6) the naming rule is: AWS+ site name.
For information of hydrometeorological network or station, please refer to Liu et al. (2018), and for observation data processing, please refer to Liu et al. (2011).
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2016年1月1日至2016年12月31日黑河水文气象观测网中游大满超级站气象要素梯度观测系统数据。站点位于甘肃省张掖市大满灌区农田内，下垫面是玉米田。观测点的经纬度是100.3722E, 38.8555N，海拔1556m。风速/风向、空气温度、相对湿度传感器分别架设在3m、5m、10m、15m、20m、30m、40m处，共7层，朝向正北；气压计安装在2m处；翻斗式雨量计安装在塔西侧约8m处，架高2.5m；四分量辐射仪安装在12m处，朝向正南；两个红外温度计安装在12m处，朝向正南，探头朝向是垂直向下；土壤热流板（自校正式）（3块）依次埋设在地下6cm处，朝向正南距离塔体2m处，其中两块（Gs_2、Gs_3）埋设在棵间，一块（Gs_1）埋设在植株下面；平均土壤温度传感器TCAV埋设在地下2cm、4cm处，朝向正南，距离塔体2m处；土壤温度探头埋设在地表0cm和地下2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、80cm、120cm和160cm处，在距离气象塔2m的正南方；土壤水分传感器分别埋设在地下2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、80cm、120cm和160cm处，在距离气象塔2m的正南方；光合有效辐射仪安装在12m处，探头朝向是垂直向上；另有四个光合有效辐射仪分别架设在冠层上方和冠层内，冠层上方安装在12m（探头垂直向上和向下方向各一个）、冠层内安装在0.3m（探头垂直向上和向下方向各一个）高处，朝向正南。
观测项目有：风速（WS_3m、WS_5m、WS_10m、WS_15m、WS_20m、WS_30m、WS_40m）(单位：米/秒)、风向（WD_3m、WD_5m、WD_10m、WD_15m、WD_20m、WD_30m、WD_40m）(单位：度)、空气温湿度（Ta_3m、Ta_5m、Ta_10m、Ta_15m、Ta_20m、Ta_30m、Ta_40m和RH_3m、RH_5m、RH_10m、RH_15m、RH_20m、RH_30m、RH_40m）(单位：摄氏度、百分比)、气压（Press）(单位：百帕)、降水量（Rain）(单位：毫米)、四分量辐射（DR、UR、DLR_Cor、ULR_Cor、Rn）(单位：瓦/平方米)、地表辐射温度（IRT_1、IRT_2）(单位：摄氏度)、平均土壤温度（TCAV）(单位：摄氏度)、土壤热通量（Gs_1、Gs_2、Gs_3）(单位：瓦/平方米)、土壤水分（Ms_2cm、Ms_4cm、Ms_10cm、Ms_20cm、Ms_40cm、Ms_80cm、Ms_120cm、Ms_160cm）(单位：百分比)、土壤温度（Ts_0cm、Ts_2cm、Ts_4cm、Ts_10cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_40cm、Ts_80cm、Ts_120cm、Ts_160cm）(单位：摄氏度) 、光合有效辐射（PAR）(单位：微摩尔/平方米秒)、冠层上向上与向下光合有效辐射（PAR_U_up、PAR_U_down）(单位：微摩尔/平方米秒)和冠层下向上与向下光合有效辐射（PAR_D_up、PAR_D_down）(单位：微摩尔/平方米秒)。
观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保每天144个数据（每10min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示； 2016.10.10-10.25日土壤部分的传感器进行调整，数据不能使用；（2）剔除有重复记录的时刻；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）数据中以红字标示的部分为有疑问的数据；（5）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2016-6-10 10:30；（6）命名规则为：AWS+站点名称。
水文气象网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

background: The two-source energy balance (TSEB) model was successfully applied to estimate evaporation (E), transpiration (T), and evapotranspiration (ET) for land covered with vegetation, which has significantly important applications for the terrestrial water cycle and water resource management. One-source evapotranspiration estimation models combine the soil–vegetation components into a single source. However, in real landscape conditions, the surface is heterogeneous and contains a mixture of soil and vegetation having different temperatures and resistance to energy exchange. Shuttleworth and Wallace proposed a typical two-source evapotranspiration estimation model in which the energy partition is assumed to occur in both “the above canopy” and “the under soil” cases. Water vapor and heat meet over the reference height in the interior of the canopy. Moreover, the mixed water vapor and heat can only exit through the top of the canopy; the total heat flux is in addition to the fluxes coming from every surface layer. However, the model is complex, having over five resistances that cannot be accurately calculated. In addition, the model includes required parameters and observations that cannot be readily obtained from operational satellite- and ground-based data; therefore, the range of applications of the model is limited.

The TSEB model has undergone several revisions, improving the estimation of soil and canopy net radiation, the aerodynamic resistance of the soil surface, the fractional vegetation coverage observed at the radiometer view angle, the distribution of regional-scale near-surface air temperature, and soil and canopy component temperatures. Because the TSEB model only requires the surface energy balance model with a single measurement of land surface temperature, the original model and subsequent refinements have been widely used to estimate E and T under a wide variety of vegetation types, vegetation coverage, climates, and spatial scales. However, most studies have only evaluated the total fluxes or ET (soil plus canopy) in comparison with measurements using the Bowen ratio–energy balance system, the eddy covariance (EC) system, or the large aperture scintillometer.

Accurately estimating surface fluxes in a strongly advective irrigated agricultural area is a particularly challenging task and is even more difficult when the EC flux measurements of H and LE have an incomplete energy balance closure with respect to the available energy Rn−G0. The previous sensitivity studies found that the TSEB model performance is mainly affected by the uncertainty in surface–air temperature difference. Sometimes, this difference is dominant due to the errors in determining the surface soil and vegetation component temperatures from the surface composite radiometric temperature. In this letter, it is shown that there is an overestimation of the component temperatures compared with the observed composite radiometric. This often leads to the most crucial effect on the TSEB model performance. In addition, another factor is the strong advective environment in this region.
research objective: In this letter, the ground-measured soil and canopy component temperatures were used to estimate E, T, and ET, which were better validated with observed ratios of E (E/ET%) and T (T/ET%) using the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes, and the ET measurements using an eddy covariance (EC) system.

The objective of this letter is to estimate E, T, and ET using the soil and canopy component temperatures observed via a high-resolution thermal camera as inputs to a series TSEB model and to subsequently better validate E, T, and ET using a combination of the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotope technique and EC measurements.
challenges: However, the current composite temperature separation approaches are limited in their effectiveness in arid regions. Moreover, E and T are difficult to measure on the ground.

Errors in the derived component temperature were primarily caused by image classification errors; these classification errors varied with vegetation abundance. The higher uncertainty of H estimation is not only caused by the uncertainty of the TSEB model but also due to the increased uncertainty of the EC system, which is 18% when the mean H is small in the irrigated farmland. Due to image pixel classification errors, soil pixels were counted as vegetation pixels, which produced an overestimation of the canopy temperature under the developing vegetation abundance. Alternatively, ignoring atmospheric upwelling radiation and transmittance could have produced the uncertainties in the estimated temperatures. In addition, the estimated uncertainty of the incoming short- and long-wave radiation transmittances through the canopy may be another source of Rn estimation errors.
methods: In this letter, the field observations were obtained from the Daman superstation installed in the central oasis, which is a 40-m boundary layer tower located at 100.3722° E, 38.8555° N and at an elevation of 1556 m. The meteorological parameters were measured every 10 min and included air temperature, wind speed, humidity at 5 m over the ground, four-component radiations (measured at 12 m above the ground using a four-component radiometer), and turbulent fluxes (measured at 4.5 m above the ground using an EC system with a sampling frequency of 10 Hz). The soil heat fluxes were measured using three heat plates located 6 cm under the ground. A Fluke Ti55 thermal infrared camera was manually operated on a 25-m-high platform on a boundary layer tower to measure the thermal radiation of the cropland approximately every 120 min; the observations were collected as thermal images from approximately 07:00 to 19:00 China Standard Time (CST) during the daytime. The ground-based measurement data were applied to partition ET into E and T applying the Craig–Gordon model.

To evaluate the TSEB model accurately, the soil heat flux was using the ground measurement. In addition, the soil and canopy sensible heat fluxes were estimated using the series TSEB model, and their latent heat fluxes were calculated while solving the energy balance equations (1) and (2), respectively. The soil and canopy component temperatures were calculated using the images obtained with the thermal camera. To calculate the component temperatures, the visible and NIR images were classified into soil and canopy pixels using the maximum-likelihood method. Next, the soil and canopy directional brightness temperatures were exacted from the thermal images. Finally, the thermal infrared temperatures were converted to the radiation temperatures using the incoming long-wave radiation from the sky and the soil and canopy emissivities. Next, the simulated radiometric temperatures were validated against the surface radiometric temperatures, which were calculated according to the incoming long-wave radiation observed by the four-component radiometer.
dataset: The experimental area is an artificial oasis that is covered with maize, vegetables, and orchards. Data of day of year (DOY) 170, 173, 176, 192, 195, 231, 252, and 256 were used to determine ET and the ratios of E (E/ET%) and T (T/ET%) to ET during the Multi-Scale Observation Experiment on Evapotranspiration over heterogeneous land surfaces, which was part of the Heihe Water Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER-MUSOEXE).
findings: Our results indicated that even under the strongly advective conditions, the TSEB model produced reliable estimates of the E/ET% and T/ET% ratios and of ET. The mean bias and root-mean-square error (RMSE) of E/ET% were 1% and 2%, respectively, and the mean bias and RMSE of T/ET% were −1% and 2%, respectively. In addition, the model exhibited relatively reliable estimates in the latent heat flux, with mean bias and RMSE values of 31 and 61 W·m−2, respectively, compared with the measurements from the EC system. These results demonstrated that a robust soil and vegetation component temperature calculation was crucial for estimating E, T, and ET. Moreover, the separate validation of E/ET% and T/ET% provides a good prospect for TSEB model improvements.

Our results demonstrated that the TSEB model using soil and canopy component radiometric temperatures, which were obtained from a high-precision thermal infrared camera, can be applied in a strongly advection-irrigated agricultural area. Notably, the results illustrated that the latent fluxes of the soil and vegetation components were successfully separated with reasonable accuracy, as assessed using ground-based measurements. The estimated E/ET% and E/ET% values agreed well with the values observed using the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes technique during the early, middle, and late growing seasons. In addition, the TSEB model produced reliable estimations of Rn, H, and LE; the mean biases of Rn, H, and LE were −18, 5, and 31 W ·m−2, respectively, and the RMSEs of Rn, H, and LE were 29, 19, and 61 W · m−2, respectively. This finding suggests that given accurate soil and vegetation component temperatures, E and T can be accurately separated from ET using the TSEB model.
backgroundCn: 双源能量平衡（TSEB）模型成功应用于估算植被覆盖土地的蒸发（E）、蒸腾（T）和蒸散发（ET），这对陆地水循环和水资源管理具有重要意义。单源蒸散发估算模型将土壤-植被组件合并为一个单一来源。然而，在真实的景观条件下，表面是异质的，包含具有不同温度和能量交换阻力的土壤和植被的混合物。因此，单源模型显然无法准确估算表面蒸散发，因为其影响。

Shuttleworth和Wallace提出了一种典型的双源蒸散发估算模型，该模型假设能量分配发生在“树冠上方”和“土壤下方”两种情况。水蒸气和热量在树冠内部的参考高度相遇。此外，混合的水蒸气和热量只能通过树冠顶部排出；总热通量是除了来自每个表层的通量之外的额外通量。然而，该模型较为复杂，具有超过五个无法准确计算的阻力。此外，该模型还包括一些所需的参数和观测数据，这些数据无法从操作性卫星和地面数据中轻易获得；因此，该模型的应用范围受到限制。

TSEB模型经过多次修订，改善了土壤和冠层净辐射的估算、土壤表面的气动阻力、在辐射计视角下观察到的植被覆盖度、区域尺度近地面气温的分布以及土壤和冠层组分的温度。由于TSEB模型只需要一个地表温度的单一测量来进行表面能量平衡模型的计算，因此原始模型及其后续改进已被广泛用于在各种植被类型、植被覆盖、气候和空间尺度下估算蒸散发（E）和温度（T）。然而，大多数研究仅评估了与使用波恩比-能量平衡系统、涡度协方差（EC）系统或大孔径闪烁仪的测量结果相比的总通量或蒸散发（土壤加冠层）。

在强烈对流的灌溉农业区域，准确估计表面通量是一项特别具有挑战性的任务，尤其是在能量平衡闭合不完整的情况下，EC通量测量的H和LE与可用能量Rn−G0之间存在差异。之前的敏感性研究发现，TSEB模型的性能主要受到表面-空气温差不确定性的影响。有时，这种温差由于从表面复合辐射温度中确定表面土壤和植被组分温度的误差而占主导地位。本文显示，与观测到的复合辐射温度相比，组分温度存在过高估计。这往往对TSEB模型的性能产生最关键的影响。此外，该区域的强对流环境也是另一个因素。
research objectiveCn: 在这封信中，地面测量的土壤和冠层成分温度被用来估算蒸散（E）、蒸发（T）和蒸散发（ET），这些估算通过稳定的氧和氢同位素以及使用涡度协方差（EC）系统的ET测量结果进行了更好的验证，具体表现为E（E/ET%）和T（T/ET%）的观测比率。
这封信的目的是利用高分辨率热像仪观察到的土壤和冠层组件温度作为输入，通过一系列TSEB模型来估计蒸散（E）、蒸发（T）和蒸散发（ET），并随后结合稳定氧和氢同位素技术以及涡度相关（EC）测量来更好地验证E、T和ET。
challengesCn: 然而，目前的复合温度分离方法在干旱地区的有效性有限。此外，E和T在地面上难以测量。

导出组件温度的误差主要是由于图像分类错误引起的；这些分类错误随着植被丰度的变化而变化。H估计的不确定性不仅是由于TSEB模型的不确定性，还由于EC系统的不确定性，当灌溉农田的平均H较小时，这种不确定性为18%。由于图像像素分类错误，土壤像素被错误地计为植被像素，这导致在植被丰度发展的情况下，冠层温度被高估。另一方面，忽略大气向上辐射和透射率可能导致估计温度的不确定性。此外，估计的通过冠层的短波和长波辐射透射率的不确定性可能是Rn估计误差的另一个来源。
methodsCn: 在这封信中，现场观测数据来自于安装在中央绿洲的达曼超级站，该站是一座40米高的边界层塔，位于东经100.3722°，北纬38.8555°，海拔1556米。气象参数每10分钟测量一次，包括地面5米处的气温、风速和湿度，12米高处使用四分量辐射计测量的四分量辐射，以及使用采样频率为10 Hz的涡度相关系统在4.5米高处测量的湍流通量。土壤热通量通过位于地下6厘米的三个热板进行测量。一台Fluke Ti55热红外相机在边界层塔的25米高平台上手动操作，约每120分钟测量一次农田的热辐射；观测数据在中国标准时间（CST）白天07:00至19:00期间收集为热图像。基于地面测量数据，应用Craig-Gordon模型将蒸散发（ET）分解为蒸发（E）和蒸腾（T）。

为了准确评估TSEB模型，土壤热通量使用地面测量数据。此外，土壤和冠层的感热通量是通过系列TSEB模型估算的，而它们的潜热通量则通过求解能量平衡方程（1）和（2）计算得出。土壤和冠层的组件温度是通过热像仪获取的图像计算得出的。为了计算组件温度，使用最大似然法将可见光和近红外图像分类为土壤和冠层像素。接下来，从热成像图像中提取土壤和冠层的方向亮度温度。最后，利用来自天空的入射长波辐射和土壤及冠层的发射率，将热红外温度转换为辐射温度。最后，模拟的辐射温度与根据四分量辐射计观测的入射长波辐射计算的表面辐射温度进行了验证。
datasetCn: 实验区域是一个人工绿洲，种植有玉米、蔬菜和果园。使用了第170、173、176、192、195、231、252和256天的数据来确定蒸散发（ET）以及蒸发（E/ET%）和蒸腾（T/ET%）相对于蒸散发的比率。这是在多尺度蒸散发观测实验中进行的，属于黑河水联合遥测实验研究（HiWATER-MUSOEXE）的一部分。
findingsCn: 我们的结果表明，即使在强烈的对流条件下，TSEB模型仍然能够可靠地估计E/ET%和T/ET%比率以及ET。E/ET%的平均偏差和均方根误差（RMSE）分别为1%和2%；而T/ET%的平均偏差和RMSE分别为−1%和2%。此外，该模型在潜热通量的估计上也表现出相对可靠的结果，与EC系统的测量值相比，平均偏差和RMSE值分别为31和61 W·m−2。这些结果表明，稳健的土壤和植被组件温度计算对于估计E、T和ET至关重要。此外，E/ET%和T/ET%的单独验证为TSEB模型的改进提供了良好的前景。

我们的结果表明，使用高精度热红外相机获得的土壤和冠层组件辐射温度的TSEB模型可以应用于强烈的平流灌溉农业区域。值得注意的是，结果表明土壤和植被组件的潜在通量成功地以合理的精度分离，经过地面测量的评估。估计的E/ET%和E/ET%值与在早期、中期和晚期生长季节使用稳定氧和氢同位素技术观察到的值一致。此外，TSEB模型对Rn、H和LE的估计也很可靠；Rn、H和LE的平均偏差分别为−18、5和31 W·m−2，Rn、H和LE的均方根误差（RMSE）分别为29、19和61 W·m−2。这一发现表明，给定准确的土壤和植被组件温度，E和T可以通过TSEB模型准确地从ET中分离出来。

background: Upscaling of eco-hydrological processes on a heterogeneous surface is a grand challenge. Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations. HiWATER is an experiment designed to address this challenge through instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales to obtain multiscale and multidisciplinary data.
challenges: Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations.
methods: Several intensive observation periods (IOPs) and continuous hydrometeorological observations were carried out during HiWATER. Only data collected during the IOP in 2012 are presented in this paper. Instruments for the oasis-desert system were arranged in hierarchically nested scales to capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes. We established a sparse network to investigate the oasis-desert interaction. One superstation was constructed within the oasis, and four EC towers and four two-layer automatic meteorological stations (AMSs) were installed in different landscapes surrounding the oasis, including sandy desert, desert pavement, desert steppe, and wetland. Intensive observations were implemented at the irrigation district scale. A total of 12 airborne remote sensing missions were conducted to cover the FEA using LiDAR, an imaging spectrometer, a multi-angle thermal imager, and an L-band microwave radiometer.
dataset: We introduce a multiscale dataset obtained from Heihe Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER) in an oasis-desert area in 2012. The HiWATER observation system consists of a flux observation matrix of eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations; an eco-hydrological sensor network of soil moisture and leaf area index; hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing using LiDAR, imaging spectrometer, multi-angle thermal imager, and L-band microwave radiometer; and synchronical ground measurements of vegetation dynamics and photosynthesis processes. All observational data were carefully quality controlled throughout sensor calibration, data collection, data processing, and datasets generation. The data are freely available at figshare and the Cold and Arid Regions Science Data Centre.
backgroundCn: 生态水文过程在异质表面上的放大是一个重大挑战。该领域的进展受到多尺度观测数据稀缺的制约。HiWATER实验旨在通过在层次嵌套的尺度上进行仪器布置，以获取多尺度和多学科的数据，从而应对这一挑战。
challengesCn: 该领域的进展受到多尺度观测稀缺的阻碍。
methodsCn: 在HiWATER期间进行了几次强烈观测期（IOPs）和连续的水文气象观测。本文仅展示了2012年IOP期间收集的数据。为了捕捉多尺度生态水文过程，绿洲-沙漠系统的仪器按照层次嵌套的尺度进行布置。我们建立了一个稀疏网络，以研究绿洲-沙漠的相互作用。在绿洲内建造了一个超级站，并在绿洲周围不同的景观中安装了四个涡度（EC）塔和四个两层自动气象站（AMS），这些景观包括沙质沙漠、沙漠铺装、沙漠草原和湿地。在灌溉区尺度上实施了强烈观测。共进行了12次空中遥感任务，使用了激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计覆盖FEA。
datasetCn: 我们介绍了一个多尺度数据集，该数据集来自2012年在绿洲-沙漠地区进行的黑河流域联合遥测实验研究（HiWATER）。HiWATER观测系统由涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站组成的通量观测矩阵；土壤湿度和叶面积指数的生态水文传感器网络；使用激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计的超高分辨率航空遥感；以及同步的植被动态和光合作用过程的地面测量。所有观测数据在传感器校准、数据收集、数据处理和数据集生成过程中都经过了严格的质量控制。这些数据可在figshare和寒区与干旱区科学数据中心免费获取。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是经济发展的基础，特别是在中国西部，自古以来就是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持了中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠区域被先前的研究者发现是碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展具有重要意义。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并对保护生态稳定性和绿洲的社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频发，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013），咸海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了一套来自人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的观测数据集，包括2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据是通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取的。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度、风速和风向的梯度；以及气压、降水和土壤湿度剖面）是通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期观测的，同时也包括地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据存档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站，包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'eddy covariance system' mean in the context of meteorological and hydrological data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在气象和水文数据收集的背景下，“涡度相关系统”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: An eddy covariance system is a method used to measure and calculate turbulent fluxes, such as water vapor and carbon exchange, by capturing turbulence and the vertical transfer of heat and mass between the surface and the atmosphere. It typically involves high-frequency measurements of wind speed, temperature, and humidity.
Definition.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统是一种用于测量和计算湍流通量的方法，例如水蒸气和碳交换，通过捕捉湍流以及表面与大气之间的热量和物质的垂直传输。它通常涉及对风速、温度和湿度的高频率测量。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'multiscale observation' entail in eco-hydrological research?
Definition.QuestionCn: “多尺度观测”在生态水文研究中涉及什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Multiscale observation refers to the practice of collecting data at various spatial and temporal scales to capture the complex interactions and processes within eco-hydrological systems. This involves using a range of instruments and techniques, such as flux towers, remote sensing, and meteorological stations, to gather comprehensive data across different environmental layers and time periods.
Definition.AnswerCn: 多尺度观测是指在不同的空间和时间尺度上收集数据，以捕捉生态水文系统内复杂的相互作用和过程。这涉及使用多种仪器和技术，如通量塔、遥感和气象站，以在不同的环境层次和时间段收集全面的数据。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'data quality control' in the collection of environmental datasets?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在收集环境数据集时，“数据质量控制”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: Data quality control in environmental datasets involves a series of procedures to ensure the accuracy, reliability, and validity of the data collected. This includes sensor calibration, careful monitoring of data collection processes, and the identification and correction of errors or anomalies in the datasets through standardized processing techniques.
Definition.AnswerCn: 环境数据集中的数据质量控制涉及一系列程序，以确保所收集数据的准确性、可靠性和有效性。这包括传感器校准、对数据收集过程的仔细监控，以及通过标准化处理技术识别和纠正数据集中的错误或异常。

Interpretation.AnswerEn: Challenges include the complexity of capturing interactions between oasis and desert systems across varied landscapes. Strategies involve implementing a sparse network of observation stations in different landscapes, conducting intensive observations, and using remote sensing to cover heterogeneous areas, thereby capturing diverse eco-hydrological processes and improving data interpretation.

Interpretation.AnswerCn: 这些数据集提供了关于能源、水汽和碳通量的长期数据，捕捉了绿洲-沙漠系统内的相互作用。这种定量理解有助于识别绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用，支持生态稳定，并为可持续发展策略提供信息，通过维持绿洲和沙漠系统之间的平衡，这对实现碳中和和生态安全至关重要。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges in accurately estimating surface fluxes in strongly advective irrigated agricultural areas?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在强烈对流的灌溉农业地区，准确估计表面通量的挑战因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Accurately estimating surface fluxes in strongly advective irrigated agricultural areas is complicated by the incomplete energy balance closure with respect to available energy, uncertainties in determining surface soil and vegetation component temperatures, and the strong advective environment. Errors in the derived component temperature, caused by image classification errors and atmospheric influences, also significantly impact the accuracy of surface flux estimations.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在强对流的灌溉农业区域，准确估计表面通量受到能量平衡闭合不完全、表层土壤和植被组分温度确定的不确定性以及强对流环境的影响。由图像分类错误和大气影响引起的组分温度误差，也显著影响表面通量估计的准确性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is there a need for multiscale observations in upscaling eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么在异质表面上进行生态水文过程的上尺度观测是必要的？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Multiscale observations are necessary for upscaling eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces due to the poor availability of multiscale data, which hinders progress in understanding these processes. Hierarchically nested scales of instrumentation and observations are required to capture the diverse and complex interactions within the oasis-desert systems, enabling a comprehensive understanding of the eco-hydrological dynamics.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 多尺度观测对于在异质表面上进行生态水文过程的上尺度研究是必要的，因为多尺度数据的稀缺性阻碍了对这些过程的理解。需要层次嵌套的仪器和观测尺度，以捕捉绿洲-沙漠系统内多样而复杂的相互作用，从而实现对生态水文动态的全面理解。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the primary causes of ecological environment degradation in inland river basins in arid and semi-arid areas?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 干旱和半干旱地区内陆河流流域生态环境退化的主要原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Ecological environment degradation in inland river basins in arid and semi-arid areas is primarily caused by factors such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms. These issues are particularly prevalent in areas along the Silk Road, where the balance between oasis and desert systems is crucial for ecological stability and socioeconomic development.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 内陆河流域的生态环境退化在干旱和半干旱地区主要是由于河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴等因素造成的。这些问题在丝绸之路沿线地区尤为突出，在这些地区，绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对生态稳定和社会经济发展至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the use of ground-measured soil and canopy component temperatures affect the accuracy of evaporation and transpiration estimates?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 地面测量的土壤和冠层组分温度的使用如何影响蒸发和蒸腾估算的准确性？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using ground-measured soil and canopy component temperatures can lead to more accurate estimates of evaporation and transpiration, as these measurements allow for better validation with observed ratios and ET measurements. This approach can improve the reliability of models like TSEB in strongly advective agricultural areas.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用地面测量的土壤和冠层组分温度可以更准确地估算蒸发和蒸腾，因为这些测量允许与观察到的比率和ET测量进行更好的验证。这种方法可以提高像TSEB这样的模型在强烈的平流农业区域的可靠性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What consequences might arise from the incomplete energy balance closure in EC flux measurements on the accuracy of surface flux estimates?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在EC通量测量中，能量平衡闭合不完整可能对表面通量估计的准确性产生哪些后果？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Incomplete energy balance closure in EC flux measurements can lead to challenges in accurately estimating surface fluxes, particularly in strongly advective irrigated areas. This can result in increased uncertainty in the TSEB model performance, especially affecting the estimation of soil and canopy component temperatures and their associated fluxes.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 在生态系统通量测量中，能量平衡闭合不完整可能导致在强对流灌溉区域准确估计表面通量的挑战。这会增加TSEB模型性能的不确定性，特别影响土壤和冠层组分温度及其相关通量的估计。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary goal of collecting multiscale and multidisciplinary data in the context of eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在异质表面生态水文过程的背景下，收集多尺度和多学科数据的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary goal is to address the challenge of poor availability of multiscale observations, which is crucial for upscaling eco-hydrological processes. The HiWATER experiment aimed to obtain multiscale and multidisciplinary data through hierarchically nested scales to better understand these processes.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是解决多尺度观测可用性差的问题，这对生态水文过程的上尺度化至关重要。HiWATER实验旨在通过分层嵌套的尺度获取多尺度和多学科的数据，以更好地理解这些过程。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to separate soil and canopy component temperatures when estimating evapotranspiration in agricultural areas?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在农业地区估算蒸散发时，分离土壤和冠层成分温度是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Separating soil and canopy component temperatures is important because it allows for more accurate estimation of evaporation and transpiration, particularly in heterogeneous landscapes. This approach enables better validation using methods like stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes and improves the reliability of models such as the TSEB model, especially in strongly advective irrigated agricultural areas.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 分离土壤和冠层成分温度是重要的，因为它可以更准确地估算蒸发和蒸腾，特别是在异质景观中。这种方法使得使用稳定氧和氢同位素等方法进行更好的验证成为可能，并提高了诸如TSEB模型等模型的可靠性，尤其是在强烈的平流灌溉农业区域。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the significance of long-term observations of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 长期观测绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水汽和碳交换有什么意义？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Long-term observations are significant as they support the understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis-desert ecosystems, which is crucial for achieving sustainable development goals. This understanding aids in maintaining the balance between oasis and desert systems, contributing to the ecological security and socioeconomic development of the region.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 长期观察具有重要意义，因为它们支持对绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的理解，这对于实现可持续发展目标至关重要。这种理解有助于维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡，促进该地区的生态安全和社会经济发展。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What steps are involved in the installation and configuration of eddy covariance systems for measuring turbulent fluxes in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中安装和配置涡度相关系统以测量湍流通量涉及哪些步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Eddy covariance systems are installed at 4.5 meters above the ground to measure turbulent fluxes with a sampling frequency of 10 Hz. The systems are part of a flux observation matrix that includes large aperture scintillometers and automatic meteorological stations, and are calibrated and processed to ensure data accuracy and reliability.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 涡动协方差系统安装在离地面4.5米的高度，以10赫兹的采样频率测量湍流通量。这些系统是一个通量观测矩阵的一部分，包括大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站，并经过校准和处理，以确保数据的准确性和可靠性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do advancements in thermal infrared imaging enable more accurate estimation of evapotranspiration components in agricultural areas?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 热红外成像技术的进步如何使农业地区蒸散发组成部分的估算更加准确？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Advancements in thermal infrared imaging enable more accurate estimation of evapotranspiration components by allowing for the separation of soil and canopy component temperatures. This is achieved through the use of high-resolution thermal cameras that provide detailed thermal images, which are then classified to distinguish between soil and canopy pixels. This refinement allows for improved validation of soil evaporation and canopy transpiration measurements using models like the two-source energy balance (TSEB) model.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 热红外成像技术的进步使得蒸散发组成部分的估算更加准确，因为它能够分离土壤和冠层的温度。这是通过使用高分辨率热像仪提供详细的热图像来实现的，这些图像随后被分类以区分土壤和冠层像素。这一改进使得使用双源能量平衡（TSEB）模型对土壤蒸发和冠层蒸腾的测量进行更好的验证成为可能。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges could arise in developing a comprehensive dataset for eco-hydrological processes in oasis-desert systems?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在开发关于绿洲-沙漠系统生态水文过程的综合数据集时，可能会出现哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Challenges in developing a comprehensive dataset for eco-hydrological processes in oasis-desert systems include the difficulty of acquiring multiscale observations, the complexity of capturing interactions between diverse landscapes, and ensuring data quality control across various sensors and measurement techniques. These challenges are compounded by the need for long-term and continuous data collection to understand dynamic environmental changes.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在开发绿洲-沙漠系统生态水文过程的综合数据集时，面临的挑战包括获取多尺度观测数据的困难、捕捉不同景观之间相互作用的复杂性，以及确保各种传感器和测量技术的数据质量控制。这些挑战因需要长期和持续的数据收集以理解动态环境变化而更加复杂。

Expectation.QuestionEn: How might the integration of remote sensing technologies like LiDAR and thermal imagers enhance the quality and scope of datasets focused on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges in arid regions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 遥感技术如激光雷达（LiDAR）和热成像仪的集成如何增强针对干旱地区能源、水蒸气和碳交换的数据集的质量和范围？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The integration of remote sensing technologies such as LiDAR and thermal imagers can significantly enhance datasets by providing high-resolution spatial and temporal data. These technologies capture detailed land surface characteristics and atmospheric conditions, allowing for accurate modeling of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges. This approach also supports the examination of large-scale patterns and processes that are challenging to monitor solely through ground-based observations.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 遥感技术的集成，如激光雷达（LiDAR）和热成像仪，可以通过提供高分辨率的空间和时间数据显著增强数据集。这些技术捕捉详细的地表特征和大气条件，从而实现能量、水蒸气和碳交换的准确建模。这种方法还支持对大规模模式和过程的研究，这些模式和过程仅通过地面观测难以监测。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of utilizing a hierarchical nested scale approach in capturing multi-scale eco-hydrological processes for dataset collection in oasis-desert systems?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您将如何评估在捕捉绿洲-沙漠系统中的多尺度生态水文过程时，采用分层嵌套尺度方法在数据集收集中的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The hierarchical nested scale approach, as applied in the HiWATER experiment, appears to be effective in capturing multi-scale eco-hydrological processes. This method involves arranging instruments on multiple scales, including the use of superstations, eddy covariance towers, and automatic meteorological stations, to obtain comprehensive and multi-disciplinary data. The approach helps in addressing the challenge of upscaling eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces, providing a rich dataset that includes various observations such as flux, soil moisture, and vegetation dynamics.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 分层嵌套尺度方法在HiWATER实验中的应用似乎有效地捕捉了多尺度生态水文过程。该方法涉及在多个尺度上布置仪器，包括使用超级站、涡度协方差塔和自动气象站，以获取全面和多学科的数据。这种方法有助于解决在异质表面上对生态水文过程进行上尺度处理的挑战，提供了丰富的数据集，包括各种观测，如通量、土壤湿度和植被动态。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the potential limitations or challenges of using thermal infrared cameras for estimating soil and canopy component temperatures in strongly advective areas?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在强对流区域使用热红外相机估计土壤和冠层成分温度的潜在限制或挑战是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Using thermal infrared cameras for estimating soil and canopy component temperatures in strongly advective areas can present challenges such as the potential for image classification errors, which can lead to inaccuracies in component temperature estimation. These errors may arise from misclassifying soil and vegetation pixels, affecting the accuracy of the canopy temperature estimates. Additionally, the strong advective environment can further complicate measurements, leading to uncertainties in estimating surface fluxes of heat and evapotranspiration. Nevertheless, when component temperatures are accurately measured, the TSEB model can provide reliable estimates of energy and water fluxes.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在强对流区域使用热红外相机估计土壤和冠层成分温度可能会面临挑战，例如图像分类错误的潜在风险，这可能导致成分温度估计的不准确。这些错误可能源于土壤和植被像素的误分类，从而影响冠层温度估计的准确性。此外，强对流环境可能进一步复杂化测量，导致在估计热通量和蒸散发时的不确定性。然而，当成分温度被准确测量时，TSEB模型可以提供可靠的能量和水分通量估计。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, how can the integration of airborne remote sensing technologies enhance the data collection process for understanding oasis-desert interactions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在您看来，机载遥感技术的整合如何能够增强数据收集过程，以理解绿洲-沙漠相互作用？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Airborne remote sensing technologies, such as LiDAR, imaging spectrometers, and thermal imagers, can significantly enhance data collection processes for understanding oasis-desert interactions by providing high-resolution spatial data across large areas. These technologies complement ground-based measurements by capturing detailed information on land surface characteristics, vegetation cover, and soil moisture, which are crucial for analyzing energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange dynamics. The integration of these technologies allows for comprehensive multiscale observations, facilitating a better understanding of eco-hydrological processes and improving the ability to model and manage oasis-desert systems effectively.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 空气遥感技术，如激光雷达（LiDAR）、成像光谱仪和热成像仪，可以显著增强对绿洲-沙漠相互作用的理解的数据收集过程，因为它们能够在大范围内提供高分辨率的空间数据。这些技术通过捕捉土地表面特征、植被覆盖和土壤湿度的详细信息，补充了地面测量，这些信息对于分析能量、水蒸气和碳交换动态至关重要。这些技术的整合允许进行全面的多尺度观测，促进对生态水文过程的更好理解，并提高有效建模和管理绿洲-沙漠系统的能力。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the challenges involved in collecting multiscale eco-hydrological data in oasis-desert systems and propose methods to overcome these challenges.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 分析在绿洲-沙漠系统中收集多尺度生态水文数据所面临的挑战，并提出克服这些挑战的方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges in collecting multiscale eco-hydrological data in oasis-desert systems include the poor availability of multiscale observations and the complexity of capturing multi-scale processes. To overcome these challenges, a hierarchical instrumentation approach can be applied, as demonstrated by the HiWATER experiment, which used a combination of flux observation matrices, eco-hydrological sensor networks, and remote sensing tools to obtain comprehensive data.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中收集多尺度生态水文数据的挑战包括多尺度观测的可用性差和捕捉多尺度过程的复杂性。为克服这些挑战，可以采用分层仪器方法，正如HiWATER实验所示，该实验结合了通量观测矩阵、生态水文传感器网络和遥感工具，以获得全面的数据。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please describe a systematic approach to ensuring data quality and consistency in a large-scale hydrometeorological observation network.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请描述一种系统的方法，以确保大规模水文气象观测网络中的数据质量和一致性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Ensuring data quality and consistency in a large-scale hydrometeorological observation network involves implementing rigorous quality control measures throughout sensor calibration, data collection, data processing, and dataset generation. This can be exemplified by the procedures used in the Heihe Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER), where all observational data were subjected to careful quality control and calibration processes.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 确保大规模水文气象观测网络的数据质量和一致性涉及在传感器校准、数据收集、数据处理和数据集生成的各个环节实施严格的质量控制措施。这可以通过在黑河流域联合遥测实验研究（HiWATER）中使用的程序来说明，其中所有观测数据都经过仔细的质量控制和校准过程。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore potential methods for enhancing the accuracy of energy flux estimations in strongly advective environments using remote sensing and ground-based observations.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 探索在强对流环境中使用遥感和地面观测提高能量通量估计准确性的潜在方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Enhancing the accuracy of energy flux estimations in strongly advective environments can be achieved by combining remote sensing and ground-based observations. The TSEB model, which uses soil and canopy component temperatures obtained from high-precision thermal infrared cameras, can improve estimations. Ground-based measurements, such as those from eddy covariance systems, can also be used to validate and refine these estimations, particularly by addressing uncertainties in component temperature calculations.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在强对流环境中，通过结合遥感和地面观测，可以提高能量通量估计的准确性。TSEB模型利用高精度热红外相机获取的土壤和冠层组件温度，可以改善估计。地面测量，例如涡度协方差系统的测量，也可以用于验证和完善这些估计，特别是通过解决组件温度计算中的不确定性。
